data.comment: The match has started.
Corner awarded to Santos.
In the minute 1, In Sao Paulo Santos attack through Para. The finish is off target, however.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards Corinthians a goal kick.
Throw-in for Santos in the half of Corinthians.
In the minute 3, Corinthians to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
Can Corinthians get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 5, Santos are in shooting range from this free kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in Corinthians.
Free kick for Corinthians in the half of Santos.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Santos.
In the minute 11, Santos take a 0-1 lead thanks to Madson.
Jean Mota instrumental with a fine assist.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 14, Fagner (Corinthians) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique waits before resuming play because Luan Peres for Santos is still down.
Goal kick for Santos at Neo Quimica Arena.
In the minute 16, Santos’s Luan Peres is on his feet again at Neo Quimica Arena.
Throw-in for Corinthians at Neo Quimica Arena.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 19, In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Santos capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Corinthians's half?
Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 21, Play has been interrupted briefly in Sao Paulo to check on Cassio, who is grimacing with pain.
Corinthians's Cassio is back in action after a slight knock.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 23, Ball safe as Santos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, Free kick Corinthians.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a Corinthians throw-in in Santos's half.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 27, Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Lucas Braga for Santos has been booked by Marcelo De Lima Henrique and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Luan (Corinthians) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 28, Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
Corinthians attack but Gil's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
In the minute 29, Corinthians have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Santos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Santos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 30, Can Santos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
Throw-in Santos.
Gustavo Mantuan is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 35, Gustavo Mantuan returns to the field for Corinthians after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in for Corinthians close to the penalty box.
Corinthians drives forward and Danilo Avelar gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 36, Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a Corinthians throw-in in Santos's half.
Free kick Corinthians.
Corinthians surge into the attack at Neo Quimica Arena but Danilo Avelar’s header is off-target.
In the minute 38, Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards Santos a goal kick.
Santos to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 40, Kaio Jorge for Santos gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Corinthians have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Santos at Neo Quimica Arena.
In the minute 41, Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Corinthians.
Gustavo Mantuan (Corinthians) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
In the minute 42, Gil (Corinthians) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Throw-in for Santos in their own half.
In the minute 44, Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a throw-in for Corinthians, close to Santos's area.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Santos in the half of Corinthians.
In the minute 45, In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The first half has been concluded at Neo Quimica Arena.
In the minute 45, Goal! Corinthians draw level to 1-1 through a Danilo Avelar header.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Free kick for Santos in the half of Corinthians.
In the minute 46, Tailson is on a sub for Jean Mota for Santos.
Juan Cazares is replacing Luan for the home team.
The home team have replaced Leo Natel with Gustavo Silva. This is the second substitution made today by Coelho.
In the minute 46, Corinthians make their third substitution with Mauro Boselli replacing Jo.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 48, Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Santos close to the penalty box.
In the minute 52, Can Santos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Corinthians at Neo Quimica Arena.
In the minute 54, Free kick in a good position for Corinthians!
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Roni Medeiros de Moura (Corinthians) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Corinthians's Lucas Piton Crivellaro breaks free at Neo Quimica Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
Throw-in for Corinthians at Neo Quimica Arena.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a Santos throw-in in Corinthians's half.
In the minute 61, The home team replace Roni Medeiros de Moura with Guilherme Camacho.
In the minute 63, Santos have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
Throw-in Corinthians.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Santos.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards Santos a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Corinthians is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Santos in their own half.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Corinthians in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 70, Santos needs to be cautious. Corinthians have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 71, Free kick Corinthians.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Luiz Felipe.
Cuca (Santos) has taken off Luiz Felipe who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Marcos Leonardo is the replacement.
Corinthians have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Santos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 72, Santos have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Corinthians at Neo Quimica Arena.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 74, Goal kick for Corinthians at Neo Quimica Arena.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Mateus Vital is on a sub for Gustavo Mantuan for Corinthians.
In the minute 77, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lucas Lourenco is replacing Kaio Jorge for Santos at Neo Quimica Arena.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
Mateus Vital of Corinthians gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 78, Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
In the minute 78, Lucas Lourenco (Santos) has received a first yellow card.
Santos's Marcos Leonardo gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Corinthians defender.
Corner awarded to Santos.
In the minute 80, Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Santos just outside Corinthians's area.
Danilo Avelar (Corinthians) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 82, Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Corinthians to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
Corinthians's Guilherme Camacho is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 86, Throw-in Santos.
Santos make their fourth substitution with Wagner Leonardo replacing Felipe Jonatan.
Cuca is making the team's fifth substitution at Neo Quimica Arena with Ivonei replacing Lucas Braga.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Santos in the half of Corinthians.
Santos to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corinthians's Mateus Vital gets in a shot on goal at Neo Quimica Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
Corinthians's Mauro Boselli gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards the home team a throw-in.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a Corinthians throw-in in Santos's half.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Danilo Avelar for Corinthians who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
